name: Gimme an idea - things to do, what to eat, food to cook
name_original: Gimme an idea - things to do, what to eat, food to cook
description:
Are you boring at home? Have no idea on what to cook, what to do or what to eat? This app helps you picking these troubles off and gives you different ideas you may never think of.

What to cook
A good app for people who have to cook for the family or the one you love. You cannot satisfy your sons, daughters or husband if you only cook the same few dishes in a week. If you are the mentioned “victims”, download this app NOW and introduce it to your “chef”. Simply choose “What to Cook”, a dish name will be drawn once you shake or press the machine. It’s an easy and convenient tool for you.


What to eat
Girls always ask their boys “What kind of food to eat tonight?” but they reject boys’ suggestions or the boys have no idea. Finally, the boys become “hungry wolves” or are blamed as indecisive because it used an hour to decide what to eat. Use this app to help you become a decisive man and use it as your buffer. It will be memorable to taste new food from other countries together. Simply choose “What to Eat”, a type of food will be drawn once you shake or press the machine. It’s an easy and convenient tool for you.

 What to do
There are indoor and outdoor activities which can be done alone or others in this part. If you want to make your holiday different and meaningful with your love, friends or family, shake or click the machine on your holiday or leisure time. Your wonderful life will be accumulated days by days with this app in hands.
